articles.title: Anupamaa: Aadhya and Anupama meet with an accident; Anuj secretly helps Yashdeep - The Times of India
articles.description: Anupamaa and Aadhya meet with an accident and end up in the same hospital after Anupamaa decides to raise funds for a restaurant. Anuj secretly helps Yashdeep in saving the restaurant.
